SEARCH
Package service

Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
service.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends Object
The MusicPlayer class provides methods to play, pause, resume, and stop music or sound effects. It also allows setting custom volumes for music and sound effects.
